TEXT.TITLE: UNISYS <UIS> HAS SECURITY SYSTEM FOR MAINFRAMES
TEXT.BODY: Unisys Corp said shipments will begin in July 1987 of its new security software package to prevent unauthorized access to its A series mainframe computers used by commercial customers and for government installations. The Infoguard software security module extends the security facilities already available on A series computers, it said. Infoguard may be licensed through a five year extended term purchase or on a monthly license basis. The five year ETP ranges from 8,450 dlrs on an A 2 mainframe to 34,300 dlrs on an A 15 mainframe, it said. Reuter
